alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 12:11PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN GULF...EASTERN BAY AND CALHOUN COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA...NORTHWESTERN WAKULLA...SOUTHWESTERN GADSDEN...LIBERTY AND SOUTHWESTERN LEON COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA THROUGH 1245 PM EDT/1145 AM CDT/... At 1210 PM EDT/1110 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles west of Crawfordville to 8 miles northeast of Stonemill Creek to near Tyndall Air Force Base. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Callaway, Blountstown, Quincy, Springfield, Greensboro, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Orange, Parker, Wewahitchka, Bristol, Altha, Rock Bluff, Honeyville, Jewel Fire Tower, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Juniper, Douglas City, and Selman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
